languages.text: Загадочное творение Генеторов, включающее в себя мобильный исследовательский комплекс, установку химсинтеза и запас освященных Магос Алхемис веществ. Воссев на его командный трон, просвещенный слуга Омниссии способен остановить эпидемию, укротить строптивых духов системы климазащиты или накормить толпы протеиновыми брикетами, сотворенными из того, что прежде было ядом.

A mysterious creation of the Genetors that includes a mobile research complex, a chem-synthesis plant, and a stockpile of substances consecrated by the Magos Alchemys. An enlightened servant of the Omnissiah who has assumed its command throne is capable of stopping epidemics, taming the rebellious spirits of the enviro-protection system, or feeding the masses with nutribars created from what erst was poison.
languages.original_text: Загадочное творение Генеторов, включающее в себя мобильный исследовательский комплекс, установку химсинтеза и запас освященных Магос Алхемис веществ. Воссев на его командный трон, просвещенный слуга Омниссии способен остановить эпидемию, укротить строптивых духов системы климазащиты или накормить толпы протеиновыми брикетами, сотворенными из того, что прежде было ядом.

traits.locale_text: A mysterious creation of the Genetors that includes a mobile research complex, a chem-synthesis plant, and a stockpile of substances consecrated by the Magos Alchemys. An enlightened servant of the Omnissiah who has assumed its command throne is capable of stopping an epidemic, taming the rebellious spirits of the enviro-protection system, or feed the masses with nutribars created from what erst was poison.

A mysterious creation of the Genetors that includes a mobile research complex, a chem-synthesis plant, and a stockpile of substances consecrated by the Magos Alchemys. An enlightened servant of the Omnissiah who has assumed its command throne is capable of stopping an epidemic, taming the rebellious spirits of the enviro-protection system, or feed the masses with nutribars created from what erst was poison.

A mysterious creation of the Genetors that includes a mobile research complex, a chem-synthesis plant, and a stockpile of substances consecrated by the Magos Alchemys. An enlightened servant of the Omnissiah who has assumed its command throne is capable of stopping epidemics, taming the rebellious spirits of the enviro-protection system, or feeding the masses with nutribars created from what erst was poison.

A mysterious creation of the Genetors that includes a mobile research complex, a chem-synthesis plant, and a stockpile of substances consecrated by the Magos Alchemys. An enlightened servant of the Omnissiah who has assumed its command throne is capable of stopping epidemics, taming the rebellious spirits of the enviro-protection system, or feeding the masses with nutribars created from what erst was poison.

A mysterious creation of the Genetors that includes a mobile research complex, a chem-synthesis plant, and a stockpile of substances consecrated by the Magos Alchemys. An enlightened servant of the Omnissiah who has assumed its command throne is capable of stopping epidemics, taming the rebellious spirits of the enviro-protection system, or feeding the masses with nutribars created from what erst was poison.

languages.text: Una creación misteriosa de los genetores que incluye un complejo de investigación móvil, una planta de síntesis química y una reserva de sustancias consagradas por el Magos Alchemys. Un sirviente ilustrado del Omnissiah que haya ocupado su trono de mando podrá detener epidemias, domar a los espíritus rebeldes del sistema de protección ambiental o alimentar a las masas con barras nutritivas de lo que hasta hace un instante era veneno.
languages.original_text: A mysterious creation of the Genetors that includes a mobile research complex, a chem-synthesis plant, and a stockpile of substances consecrated by the Magos Alchemys. An enlightened servant of the Omnissiah who has assumed its command throne is capable of stopping epidemics, taming the rebellious spirits of the enviro-protection system, or feeding the masses with nutribars created from what erst was poison.

traits.locale_text: Una creación misteriosa de los genetores que incluye un complejo de investigación móvil, una planta de síntesis química y una reserva de sustancias consagradas por el Magos Alchemys. Un sirviente ilustrado del Omnissiah que haya ocupado su trono de mando podrá detener epidemias, domar a los espíritus rebeldes del sistema de protección ambiental o alimentar a las masas con barras nutritivas de lo que hasta hace un instante era veneno.

languages.text: Cette mystérieuse création des genetors comprend un complexe de recherche mobile, une usine de chimiosynthèse et tout un stock de substances consacrées par le Magos Alchemys. Un serviteur éclairé de l'Omnimessie ayant pris place sur son trône de commandement est capable d'endiguer des épidémies, de dompter les esprits rebelles d'un système de protection environnementale, ou de nourrir les masses à l'aide de nutribarres élaborées en retraitant des substances toxiques.
languages.original_text: A mysterious creation of the Genetors that includes a mobile research complex, a chem-synthesis plant, and a stockpile of substances consecrated by the Magos Alchemys. An enlightened servant of the Omnissiah who has assumed its command throne is capable of stopping epidemics, taming the rebellious spirits of the enviro-protection system, or feeding the masses with nutribars created from what erst was poison.

traits.locale_text: Cette mystérieuse création des genetors comprend un complexe de recherche mobile, une usine de chimiosynthèse et tout un stock de substances consacrées par le Magos Alchemys. Un serviteur éclairé de l'Omnimessie ayant pris place sur son trône de commandement est capable d'endiguer des épidémies, de dompter les esprits rebelles d'un système de protection environnementale, ou de nourrir les masses à l'aide de nutribarres élaborées en retraitant des substances toxiques.

languages.text: 基因士的神秘造物，其中包含一个移动研究综合中心、一个化学合成工厂，以及一个由炼金贤者供奉的物质储备库。坐镇指挥宝座的是欧姆尼塞亚睿智的仆人，他可以阻止疫病的传播，驯服温室保护系统中不安分的机魂，或是将原本有毒的物质制作成无毒无害的营养条，养活殖民地的人口。
languages.original_text: A mysterious creation of the Genetors that includes a mobile research complex, a chem-synthesis plant, and a stockpile of substances consecrated by the Magos Alchemys. An enlightened servant of the Omnissiah who has assumed its command throne is capable of stopping epidemics, taming the rebellious spirits of the enviro-protection system, or feeding the masses with nutribars created from what erst was poison.

traits.locale_text: 基因士的神秘造物，其中包含一个移动研究综合中心、一个化学合成工厂，以及一个由炼金贤者供奉的物质储备库。坐镇指挥宝座的是欧姆尼塞亚睿智的仆人，他可以阻止疫病的传播，驯服温室保护系统中不安分的机魂，或是将原本有毒的物质制作成无毒无害的营养条，养活殖民地的人口。

languages.text: 移動式研究施設、化学合成プラント、錬金魔術団によって聖別された物質の備蓄を含む、遺伝学者の謎めいた創造物。その指揮玉座に座する万機神の啓示を受けたしもべは、疫病を食い止め、環境保護システムの反抗的な精霊を手なずけ、かつては毒であったものから作られた栄養バーで大衆を救うことができるのだ。
languages.original_text: A mysterious creation of the Genetors that includes a mobile research complex, a chem-synthesis plant, and a stockpile of substances consecrated by the Magos Alchemys. An enlightened servant of the Omnissiah who has assumed its command throne is capable of stopping epidemics, taming the rebellious spirits of the enviro-protection system, or feeding the masses with nutribars created from what erst was poison.

traits.locale_text: 移動式研究施設、化学合成プラント、錬金魔術団によって聖別された物質の備蓄を含む、遺伝学者の謎めいた創造物。その指揮玉座に座する万機神の啓示を受けたしもべは、疫病を食い止め、環境保護システムの反抗的な精霊を手なずけ、かつては毒であったものから作られた栄養バーで大衆を救うことができるのだ。

languages.text: Eine mysteriöse Schöpfung der Genetoren, die einen mobilen Forschungskomplex, eine Chem-Synthese-Anlage und ein vom Magos Alchemys gesegnetes Materiallager umfasst. Ein erleuchteter Diener des Omnissiah, der seinen Kommandothron erklommen hat, kann Epidemien aufhalten, die rebellischen Elemente der Umgebungsschutzsysteme zähmen oder die Massen mit Nutririegeln ernähren, die aus zuvor noch giftigen Stoffen hergestellt wurden.
languages.original_text: A mysterious creation of the Genetors that includes a mobile research complex, a chem-synthesis plant, and a stockpile of substances consecrated by the Magos Alchemys. An enlightened servant of the Omnissiah who has assumed its command throne is capable of stopping epidemics, taming the rebellious spirits of the enviro-protection system, or feeding the masses with nutribars created from what erst was poison.

traits.locale_text: Eine mysteriöse Schöpfung der Genetoren, die einen mobilen Forschungskomplex, eine Chem-Synthese-Anlage und ein vom Magos Alchemys gesegnetes Materiallager umfasst. Ein erleuchteter Diener des Omnissiah, der seinen Kommandothron erklommen hat, kann Epidemien aufhalten, die rebellischen Elemente der Umgebungsschutzsysteme zähmen oder die Massen mit Nutririegeln ernähren, die aus zuvor noch giftigen Stoffen hergestellt wurden.

languages.text: Gezici bir araştırma kompleksi, bir kimyasal sentez tesisi ve Magos Alşimis tarafından kutsanmış bir malzeme stoku içeren; Genetörlerin gizemli bir icadı. Komuta tahtına oturan, Hermesih'in aydınlanmış bir hizmetkarı; salgın hastalıkları durdurabilecek, çevre koruma sisteminin asi ruhlarını ehlileştirebilecek veya kitleleri eskiden zehirli olan maddelerden imal edilen besinbarlarla besleyebilecek güce erişir.
languages.original_text: A mysterious creation of the Genetors that includes a mobile research complex, a chem-synthesis plant, and a stockpile of substances consecrated by the Magos Alchemys. An enlightened servant of the Omnissiah who has assumed its command throne is capable of stopping epidemics, taming the rebellious spirits of the enviro-protection system, or feeding the masses with nutribars created from what erst was poison.
